Introduction

Welcome to Vanillaton, the most quintessentially average place on the planet, and most definitely not infested with people trying to kill you. No, that body over there is most definitely a Christmas decoration. Now, please excuse me while I make a call.

Joe Public, Hapless “Christmas Decoration,” killed Night 0

Well, it appears we have to find a prankster, because that wasn’t supposed to be put here as per Property Regulation 216a. We take our property regulations very seriously around here, so our friendly neighbors are erecting the gallows.

Still Suffering (1/12)

3. brokenscraps, Vanilla Townie, Survived!

(Bold=Confirmed)
(*=Prods)

Not Quite Breathing (11/12)

Parama, Cop, Shot Night One

andrew94, Vanilla Townie, Killed Night Five
Trendall* PranaDevil, Vengeful Townie, Lynched Day 6

Endgame

Rules

1. Votes must be bolded in this format: Vote: Wraith
2. Days will have a deadline of three weeks. Deadline can be extended under special circumstances
3. Mafia may not daytalk
4. Do not under any circumstances communicate with another player(s) outside the game thread.
5. Please do not quote the role PM
6. Absolutely no invisible, small, or otherwise unreadable text. Spoiler tags are allowed as long as the nature of their contents are clearly labeled.
7. You will be prodded after failing to post in 72 hours. If you require a third prod at any point in the game you will instead be replaced. Inform in-thread of any upcoming V/LA in bold
8. “Bah” posts are allowed, and should not include any kind of game-related information. However, lynched players may continue to talk during Twlight.
9. Twilight occurs after the hammer and before the lynch scene. You may continue to talk but any new votes/unvotes will not be counted.
10. INSERT COLOR is my color, don’t use it.
11. I modkill at my discretion, with or without warnings depending on the offense. If you think something will test my rules (or patience), ask me first, or don’t do it at all. Modkills will end the day and turn the killed player into a Neutral Survivor.
12. If I make a mistake in some way, point it out via: @mod: You made a mistake
13. I reserve the right to add to or change the rules at my discretion. There are no loopholes, and I enforce ex post facto.
14. Blue will be my color in all mod posts after rules. Do not use it.
15. Don't be afraid to have fun. Despite the wording of these rules I am not a ruthless dictator and the vast majority of players are not trolls. Good luck!
-----15a. To be more specific: Please Be Civil
16. On Activity Requirements and Replacements: Players will be prodded upon request or if they go 72 hours without any sort of activity. A player will receive two prods before being force-replaced. Replacements will be recruited via the mini normal queue topic or if a player contacts me via PM and requests to be the first priority for replacing someone.
Role PMs have been sent out. Please confirm via PM. When all have confirmed, the topic will be unlocked and Day 1 will begin.

All players have confirmed.

Day One

Deadlines will be defaultly three weeks. Your deadline for Day 1 is therefore is January 9, 2011

Claim: NK-Immune Unlynchable Vigilante Daycop

I have a guilty on 4computer. vote: 4computer

I have a feeling brokenscraps is scum. It's suspicious that he took the longest to confirm, clearly he was up to something last night. Perhaps assaulting an innocent Christmas decoration? I think so.

vote: brokenscraps
I'm going to Vote: Andrew94 for having a name that means "manly" in Greek. Just for kicks. Nothing personal Andy.

Good morning y'all.

Parama... you should probably just vig them so the rest of the town can sheep you for the rest of the game.

Anywho, tyler, why so passive? You sound like you don't want to attract attention... scum tend to try and stay out of the spotlight like that, y'know. HoS: tyler. I'd vote but 4computer is confirmed scum to me.

First and foremost, any millers should claim now. I don't want a random lolbutI'mmiller claim AFTER I get a guilty on someone
And another thing: WHO ARE YOU PEOPLE? I've only played with Lat before and that was in a lolhydra game that sucked.
Last point of note - Lateralus is in fact an awesome album.
Is it passive to Random Vote? I'm just kicking it off with a post. If i wanted to stay out of the spotlight, I'd have let a few more people post.
Also, I'm pretty new at the whole mafia thing... You're a Daycop Vigilante who is immune to death at anytime, regardless of circumstances? Is there any sarcasm in this post at all?

Parama wrote:And another thing: WHO ARE YOU PEOPLE? I've only played with Lat before and that was in a lolhydra game that sucked.
Last point of note - Lateralus is in fact an awesome album.

Who are you?

You decide.

P-Edit:
I am.

Balanced? What's balanced about that? Don't get me wrong, I'm glad you're on my side. I'm just a vanilla townie, but it strikes me as tremendously unfair that you would be unkillable, able to kill on your own outside of lynchings, and our investigator.  That's why I'm just a vanilla townie. You got [i]all[\i] the roles.
Did you know that it's incredibly anti-town to claim vanilla townie without being asked to?
Nope. Didn't know that. Like I said, I'm pretty new. Not sure how that would be anti-town, but I'll do my best to hide my true identity next time.

Okay, teaching mode for a minute:
Scum will more than likely try to focus their kills on finding power roles. Any and every VT claim makes it easier for scum to find PRs because it reduces the pool of players that could potentially be PRs. So claiming VT is incredibly anti-town, and why VT claims tend to get lynched more often than not.
Also, you're playing the inexperience card way too much. I don't care if you joined yesterday, this isn't a newbie game.
I understand it's not a newbie game. That's just honestly a piece of strategy that had never come up for me before.
errr parama, is your claim ACTUALLY true or are you just being sarcastic
You can choose to believe me or not, it's no big deal if you don't though since it's only day 1.

Hey guys. Let's catch some scum.

First off I have a rather important announcement to make. Actually, I was gonna reveal later but I figure doing it now would jump start the day hardcore.
Kills via mafia may happen if I play uber pro-town but I'm way too paranoid by being targeted by a doc or something if I do. Eh so, wihtout a further ado,

You didn't ruin your game by claiming VT. It isn't really even scummy. If you are scum and you claim VT it is hardly much of a defense, you'll probably get lynched anyway. It is anti-town if you are a vanilla townie, because it narrows don't the pool of players with power roles that the scum have to hunt for, but it doesn't make you scum. It isn't good play, but you weren't going to get lynched straight away for it, and if you followed on from that by being pro-town pretty much all would be forgiven.

Now asking to be lynched is, I think, a null tell: it plays towards no win condition, and unless we are looking at your meta and it is very out-of-character it doesn't say too much about your alignment. Do you usually get so defeatist when playing games like this?

Anyways, here's the setup in a short list:

1 Cop

While the Vengeful Townie role was directly inspired by (read: ripped off from) Boston Brawl, I in no way believed that the Vengeful would live to endgame LyLo like Prana did and pull a gambit like that. I believed the Vengeful would try to kill himself as early as possible to avoid being nightkilled.

I strongly believed the Mafia would win until Night 5. When they killed the Cop N1 with a lucky shot I was like "game over," even when the town recovered a little by lynching the Mafia RB D2. However, both sides' play dropped somewhat the next few days and nights (Zyrc was definitely the most active scum player, I must admit), and a lurkerkill followed by a lurker lynch were not the best decisions IMO. Havingfitz was the right kill (and IMO should have been the N2 kill) because he was definitely the most obvtownie player in the game, plus he was the Doctor. PranaDevil was the next-most obvtown player, and I have absolutely no clue why the scum let him live to LyLo. I fully expected Prana to be the N5 kill, and my jaw dropped when it was andrew, who (as I noted in the dead QT several times) was by far the most easily manipulated or easily mislynched player. The only explanation I can think of is that Prana suspected Xtoxm somewhat D5 and Xtoxm was attempting to frame Prana, which was inadvisable considering that Prana and kiku cross-voted in LyLo as he himself noted.

I would like to thank Xtoxm a lot for filling into a slot that was causing me considerable difficulty and playing it both fairly actively and well to the end of the game. Despite the setbacks and shortcomings of activity, I feel this was a pretty good first modded game for me.
